00028 #ifndef __SkeletonFileFormat_H__
00029 #define __SkeletonFileFormat_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00055     enum SkeletonChunkID {
00056         SKELETON_HEADER            = 0x1000,
00057             // char* version           : Version number check
00058             SKELETON_BLENDMODE         = 0x1010, // optional
00059                 // unsigned short blendmode     : SkeletonAnimationBlendMode
00060         
00061         SKELETON_BONE              = 0x2000,
00062         // Repeating section defining each bone in the system. 
00063         // Bones are assigned indexes automatically based on their order of declaration
00064         // starting with 0.
00065 
00066             // char* name                       : name of the bone
00067             // unsigned short handle            : handle of the bone, should be contiguous & start at 0
00068             // Vector3 position                 : position of this bone relative to parent 
00069             // Quaternion orientation           : orientation of this bone relative to parent 
00070             // Vector3 scale                    : scale of this bone relative to parent 
00071 
00072         SKELETON_BONE_PARENT       = 0x3000,
00073         // Record of the parent of a single bone, used to build the node tree
00074         // Repeating section, listed in Bone Index order, one per Bone
00075 
00076             // unsigned short handle             : child bone
00077             // unsigned short parentHandle   : parent bone
00078 
00079         SKELETON_ANIMATION         = 0x4000,
00080         // A single animation for this skeleton
00081 
00082             // char* name                       : Name of the animation
00083             // float length                      : Length of the animation in seconds
00084         
00085             SKELETON_ANIMATION_BASEINFO = 0x4010,
00086             // [Optional] base keyframe information
00087             // char* baseAnimationName (blank for self)
00088             // float baseKeyFrameTime
00089 
00090             SKELETON_ANIMATION_TRACK = 0x4100,
00091             // A single animation track (relates to a single bone)
00092             // Repeating section (within SKELETON_ANIMATION)
00093                 
00094                 // unsigned short boneIndex     : Index of bone to apply to
00095 
00096                 SKELETON_ANIMATION_TRACK_KEYFRAME = 0x4110,
00097                 // A single keyframe within the track
00098                 // Repeating section
00099 
00100                     // float time                    : The time position (seconds)
00101                     // Quaternion rotate            : Rotation to apply at this keyframe
00102                     // Vector3 translate            : Translation to apply at this keyframe
00103                     // Vector3 scale                : Scale to apply at this keyframe
00104         SKELETON_ANIMATION_LINK         = 0x5000
00105         // Link to another skeleton, to re-use its animations
00106 
00107             // char* skeletonName                   : name of skeleton to get animations from
00108             // float scale                          : scale to apply to trans/scale keys
00109 
00110     };
00114 } // namespace
00115 
00116 
00117 #endif
